abstract: Military historians and senior officers counter remarks made by Donald Trump regarding campaign to recapture Mosul, Syria, from Islamic State; say his criticisms of American-backed Iraqi military strategy show clear lack of understanding of warfare, Iraqi politics and military history.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: They said that Mr. Trump’s armchair generalship revealed a fundamental lack of understanding of Iraqi politics, military warfare, and military history.
snippet: They said that Mr. Trump’s armchair generalship revealed a fundamental lack of understanding of Iraqi politics, military warfare, and military history....

headline.main: Donald Trump Is Wrong on Mosul Attack, Military Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Experts Dispute Trump in Mosul Attack Critique
